name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Has this issue happened more than once?**
This game/engine is old, bugs and crashes will happen. If they only happen once, you probably just got unlucky. Please make sure it's a repeatable issue before reporting.

**Have you read our FAQ?**
If your issue is already covered there, we will close your issue.

**What OS are you using?**
Please include sub version aka Windows 10 22H2 etc.

**Have you installed any other mods besides the files we provided?**
If so, this can and will cause issues. We cannot troubleshoot other people's works which conflicts with ours.

**Screenshots**
Please take a screenshot of your:
- Game directory (where the exe is)
- CLEO folder
- Scripts folder
- Models folder
